name: Twilight Phenomena: The Incredible Show - A Magical Hidden Object Game (Full)

description:
Unlock the complete adventure with a single purchase! No in-app purchases!

You and your sister have made it a tradition to visit the Strauss Circus every year. This year, your sister is chosen to help on stage and disappears right in front of your eyes! Uncover the dark secrets of the show before you run out of time!

• SCOUR THROUGH THE DARKNESS FULL OF HIDEOUS CREATURES
The evil magician has no intention of releasing Judith, so it’s up to you to find and save her from his powerful grasp.

• SAVE YOUR SISTER AND THE ANIMALS FROM STRAUSS’ EXPERIMENTS
Play through interactive hidden object scenes and obtain the tools that will help release the enslaved animals.

• CAN YOU UNCOVER THE HISTORY BEHIND THE TWISTED MAGIC?
Find out why the magician has gone awry by solving clever mini-games and intriguing puzzles!

• TEST YOUR COURAGE AND FACE A NEW ENEMY IN THE BONUS GAME
Continue your adventure in the additional chapter and enjoy Collector’s Edition exclusives including collectible mini-games and a comprehensive strategy guide.
